title: Skinny Bitch Ultimate Everyday Cookbook by Kim Barnouin
description:
The co-author of our international bestselling phenomenon Skinny Bitch now debuts the new 'bible' of vegan cooking. After five years atop the Skinny Bitch phenomenon, author Kim Barnouin has grown as a cook, a nutritionist, and a mum. 

Now she delivers the "Ultimate" cookbook for everyone looking for a healthier way to feed themselves and their families. The recipes will feature easy-to-find ingredients and seasonal produce (no fake meat or exotic additions) - and will provide a versatility of tastes and cuisines, from Mediterranean-influenced to California-fresh. 

Whether someone is looking to slowly add more meatless dishes to their family's meals, or wants to go 'all-out' vegan, this cookbook will be their 'go-to' source for how to do it simply and deliciously

Genre: Non-Fiction, Cooking
